imdb.plot outline: The story revolves around Lonnie Hogi, a pig who lives in New York City with his cat, Isla. Lonnie finds himself in a dead-end job in a career that he never wanted and had simply settled for. One day he has a revelation and remembers that he used to have big dreams of being a Professional Diver, and winning an Olympic Gold Medal. He decides to change his life for the better and finally pursue his true ambition.
imdb.title: Work Hard & Believe: The Journey of Lonnie Hogi
plot: The story revolves around Lonnie Hogi, a pig who lives in New York City with his cat, Isla. Lonnie finds himself in a dead-end job in a career that he never wanted and had simply settled for. One day he has a revelation and remembers that he used to have big dreams of being a Professional Diver, and winning an Olympic Gold Medal. He decides to change his life for the better and finally pursue his true ambition.
